class.name: WebSocketClient
class.author: Hokeun Kim

input.name: url
input.description: The url of the web socket server.

input.name: data
input.description: The data to be sent to the web socket server during the next firing.

input.name: enable
input.description: When this is set true, this accessor sends the data on firing.

output.name: message
output.description: The message received from the web socket server

output.name: error
output.description: The error string of the connection.

output.name: status
output.description: The status code of the connection. 1: connection established, 0: connection closed, -1: an error occurred.

class.documentation: This accessor, when initialized, connects to the web socket server, when fired, sends the data on the data port, when wraped up, closes the ongoing connection. This accessor generates output on the message port when a message is received from the server.
